Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.ObservableSubject
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
EndObserver
public class Game extends ObservableSubject implements EndObserver
The container of all the elements of the game

    • start

      public void start()
      Method start initializes the game

    • nextPlayer

      public void nextPlayer()
      update the current player and the phase of the game. During the action phase this method resets the number of available moves of the current player according to the number of players of the game

    • getNextPianification

      private Player getNextPianification()
      Gets the next player in the Players Order (clockwise).
      Returns:
      The corresponding player

    • updateActionOrder

      private void updateActionOrder()
      insert the current player in the right place of the action order according to his priority

    • getNextAction

      private Player getNextAction()
      Gets the next player in the Action Order.
      Returns:
      The corresponding player

    • startActionPhase

      private void startActionPhase()
      This methods change the current phase to ACTION and sets the right player as current player.

    • startPianificationPhase

      private void startPianificationPhase()
      Starts a pianification phase by refilling all the clouds, selecting the new current player and resetting every assistant to not already played

    • refillClouds

      private void refillClouds()
      Refill every cloud with a number of students depending on the number of players in the game

      numberOfPlayers - the number of the player in the game

      resets the number of available moves of the current player according to the number of players of the game
      Parameters:
      player - the player to reset the number of moves

    • isSameNickname

      public boolean isSameNickname(String nickname)
      Method isSameNickname checks if already exists a player with the chosen nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname that I wanted to check
      Returns:
      true if already exists a player with the chosen nickname, false if not exists a player with the chosen nickname

    • addPlayer

      public boolean addPlayer(String nickname)
      Method addPlayer adds a player if the nickname hasn't been chosen
      Parameters:
      nickname - the players nickname that I wanted to add
      Returns:
      true if the nickname hasn't been chosen false if the nickname has been chosen

    • removePlayer

      Parameters:
      nickname - the player that I wanted to remove

    • getPlayerByNickname

      public Player getPlayerByNickname(String nickname)
      Method getPlayerByNickname searches the player with the selected nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player that I wanted to have
      Returns:
      the player with the selected nickname or null if the player with the selected nickname doesn't exist

    • calculateIslandNewOwner

      public Player calculateIslandNewOwner(Island island)
      Method calculateIslandNewOwner calculates the new island owner
      Parameters:
      island - the island on which I want to check the influence
      Returns:
      the new island's owner or null if the owner doesn't change

    • updateInfluence

      public void updateInfluence(Island island)
      Method updateInfluence checks per each player the influence on the specified island, change the island's owner if necessary and moves the towers consequently
      Parameters:
      island - the island on which I want to update influence

    • getCharacterCardByName

      public CharacterCard getCharacterCardByName(CharacterName name)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the corresponding CharacterCard in the game

      Returns:
      the 3 character cards extracted

    • getWinner

      public Player getWinner() throws DrawException
      find the winner of the game.
      Returns:
      the Player who won the game or null if the game ends in a draw
      Throws:
      DrawException

    • end

      public void end()
      Ends the game immediately by changing the phase and notifying the observer with the nickname of the winner if there is one
      Specified by:
      end in interface EndObserver

      public void lastRound()
      Sets a variable which ends the game at the end of the current round
